description: Kozue is a second-year student that transfers into Suimei Academy early on in the story. She is not shown to be speaking but appears to have telepathic abilities. Kozue is in the same class as Takumi and appears to know him as she spoke to him through his mind when she walked past him on her first day at school. Like Sena, she has a Di Sword. She calls herself Kozupii.
name: Orihara Kozue
